# Colaberry AI

Colaberry AI is a destination for people, LLMs, and agents to discover, evaluate, and deploy agents, MCP servers, podcasts, and AI playbooks across industries.

## Primary sections
- / : Overview of the platform, discovery pillars, and industry focus.
- /aixcelerator/agents : Agents catalog.
- /aixcelerator/mcp : MCP server and integration library.
- /aixcelerator/skills : Skills catalog.
- /aixcelerator/skills/[slug] : Skill profile pages with reusable capability metadata and linked assets.
- /solutions : Use cases and playbooks.
- /use-cases : Structured use case catalog.
- /use-cases/[slug] : Use case profile pages with outcomes and linked assets.
- /industries : Industry-specific pages for Agriculture, Utilities, Oil & Gas, Biotech, Manufacturing, Supply Chain, and more.
- /resources : Resources hub.
- /resources/podcasts : Podcast index.
- /resources/podcasts/[slug] : Podcast detail pages with transcripts when available.
- /resources/podcasts/tag/[tag] : Podcast tag/category pages.
- /resources/white-papers : Research and POVs.
- /resources/articles : Editorial insights and implementation guidance.
- /resources/books : Books and artifacts.
- /resources/case-studies : Case studies.
- /updates : News and product updates.

## Contact
- info@colaberry.com
